data.name: ReadCashReceipt
data.value: select top(1) CRV_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRT_IDENTIFIER, CASH_RECEIPT_ID from CKT_CASH_RECEIPT where (CRV_IDENTIFIER = @crvIdentifier) and (CRT_IDENTIFIER = @crtIdentifier) and (CST_IDENTIFIER = @cstIdentifier)

data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetail1
data.value: select CRV_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRT_IDENTIFIER, CRD_ID, ADJUSTMENT_IND, RECEIVED_AMOUNT, COLLECTION_AMOUNT, COLLECTION_DATE, OBLGOR_PRSN_NBR, REFUNDED_AMT, DISTRIBUTED_AMT from CKT_CR_DETAIL where (@crtIdentifier = CRT_IDENTIFIER) and (@cstIdentifier = CST_IDENTIFIER) and (@crvIdentifier = CRV_IDENTIFIER) and (ADJUSTMENT_IND <> 'Y')

data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetail2
data.value: select distinct T1.CRV_IDENTIFIER, T1.CST_IDENTIFIER, T1.CRT_IDENTIFIER, T1.CRD_ID, T1.COLLECTION_AMOUNT from CKT_CR_DETAIL T1 join CKT_CRDTL_BAL_ADJ T2 on (T1.CRD_ID = T2.CRD_S_IDENTIFIER) and (T1.CRV_IDENTIFIER = T2.CRV_S_IDENTIFIER) and (T1.CST_IDENTIFIER = T2.CST_S_IDENTIFIER) and (T1.CRT_IDENTIFIER = T2.CRT_S_IDENTIFIER) and (@crdIdentifier = T2.CRD_IDENTIFIER) and (@crvIdentifier = T2.CRV_IDENTIFIER) and (@cstIdentifier = T2.CST_IDENTIFIER) and (@crtIdentifier = T2.CRT_IDENTIFIER)

data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetailStatHistoryCashReceiptDetailStatus
data.value: select top(1) T1.CRD_IDENTIFIER, T1.CRV_IDENTIFIER, T1.CST_IDENTIFIER, T1.CRT_IDENTIFIER, T1.CDS_IDENTIFIER, T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T1.REASON_CODE_ID, T1.CREATED_BY, T1.DISCONTINUE_DATE, T1.REASON_TEXT, T2.CODE from CKT_CR_DETAIL_STAT T2 join CKT_CRDTL_STATHIST T1 on (@crdIdentifier = T1.CRD_IDENTIFIER) and (@crvIdentifier = T1.CRV_IDENTIFIER) and (@cstIdentifier = T1.CST_IDENTIFIER) and (@crtIdentifier = T1.CRT_IDENTIFIER) and (T1.DISCONTINUE_DATE = @discontinueDate) and (T2.CRDETAIL_STAT_ID = T1.CDS_IDENTIFIER)
